titleStmt.title: Enchiridion locorum co[m]muniu[m] aduersus Lutheranos Ioanne Eckio autore ... ; ab autore iam quarto recognitu[m] & tribus locis auctum, & a pluribus mendis calcographi emunctum.
titleStmt.author: Eck, Johann, 1486-1543.

publicationStmt.publisher: Impensis Henrici Pepwel, Londini sub intersignio S. Trinitatis in Cœmiterio Diui Pauli,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound; torn with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Peterborough Cathedral. Library.
